subject: AM Brief: Thu, 31 Aug 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. Tech stocks rallied amid concerns over Pataca.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Hoeger and Sons upgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Aut varietas vilitas arceo verus barba ars adnuo.
- AFR: Paulatim valens speculum capillus catena ager.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Penny

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for QBE
body:

Client instruction just came down. We need to begin accumulating the BHP position.

Sarah Connor

Best,
James Robertson
